discussion.p: In the definitions of codecvt<>::do_out and do_in, they are specified to return noconv if "no conversion is needed". This definition is too vague, and does not say normatively what is done with the buffers.

resolution.p: Change the entry for noconv in the table under paragraph 4 in section to read:

blockquote.p: noconv: internT and externT are the same type, and input sequence is identical to converted sequence.

resolution.p: Change the Note in paragraph 2 to normative text as follows:

blockquote.p: If returns noconv, internT and externT are the same type and the converted sequence is identical to the input sequence [from,from_next). to_next is set equal to to, the value of state is unchanged, and there are no changes to the values in [to, to_limit).
